languages.text: "Мои дела на Кьяве Гамма завершены. Время вернуться к той миссии, с которой ты прибыл{mf||а} на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g}. Единственное, о чем я еще попрошу тебя — это о аудиенции, когда мы вернемся на корабль". {n}Хейнрикс склоняет голову в знак того, что разговор окончен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мои дела на Кьяве Гамма завершены. Время вернуться к той миссии, с которой ты прибыл на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g}. Единственное, о чем я еще попрошу тебя — это о аудиенции, когда мы вернемся на корабль". {n}Хейнрикс склоняет голову в знак того, что разговор окончен.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мои дела на Кьяве Гамма завершены. Время вернуться к той миссии, с которой ты прибыл{mf||а} на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g}. Единственное, о чем я еще попрошу тебя — это о аудиенции, когда мы вернемся на корабль". {n}Хейнрикс склоняет голову в знак того, что разговор окончен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission which brought you to the industrial world. I am ready to provide all my skills and abilities to cleanse Kiava Gamma of the corruption that has devoured it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission which brought you to the industrial world. I am ready to provide all my skills and abilities to cleanse Kiava Gamma of the corruption that has devoured it."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

languages.text: “我在基亚瓦伽马星的任务已经结束了，是时候完成你来这个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}该完成的事情了。我唯一的希望就是：等我们回到船上之后，我希望能与你见个面，谈一谈。”{n}海因里希低了下头，示意这场谈话已经结束了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我在基亚瓦伽马星的任务已经结束了，是时候完成你来这个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}该完成的事情了。我唯一的希望就是：等我们回到船上之后，我希望能与你见个面，谈一谈。”{n}海因里希低了下头，示意这场谈话已经结束了。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Mis asuntos en Kiava Gamma han terminado. Es hora de volver a la misión que le trae a este {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g}. Lo único que le pido más allá de lo que ya me ha concedido es una audiencia cuando volvamos a la nave». {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza, indicando que la conversación ha terminado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mis asuntos en Kiava Gamma han terminado. Es hora de volver a la misión que le trae a este {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g}. Lo único que le pido más allá de lo que ya me ha concedido es una audiencia cuando volvamos a la nave». {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza, indicando que la conversación ha terminado.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我のキアヴァ・ガンマでの仕事は終わりました。御身を{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}へ連れていくという任務にに戻る時が来たようです。一つだけ頼みたいことがあります。船に戻ったら、謁見をお願いしたい」{n}ハインリックスは頭を下げる。それは会話が終わったことを告げる合図だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我のキアヴァ・ガンマでの仕事は終わりました。御身を{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}へ連れていくという任務にに戻る時が来たようです。一つだけ頼みたいことがあります。船に戻ったら、謁見をお願いしたい」{n}ハインリックスは頭を下げる。それは会話が終わったことを告げる合図だった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Aufgabe auf Kiava Gamma ist beendet. Es ist Zeit, sich wieder der Mission zu widmen, die Euch auf die {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} geführt hat. Das Einzige, worum ich Euch bitte, ist eine Audienz, wenn wir zum Schiff zurückkehren." {n}Heinrix senkt den Kopf, um anzuzeigen, dass das Gespräch beendet ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meine Aufgabe auf Kiava Gamma ist beendet. Es ist Zeit, sich wieder der Mission zu widmen, die Euch auf die {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} geführt hat. Das Einzige, worum ich Euch bitte, ist eine Audienz, wenn wir zum Schiff zurückkehren." {n}Heinrix senkt den Kopf, um anzuzeigen, dass das Gespräch beendet ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Maintenant que j'ai terminé ce que j'avais à faire sur Kiava Gamma, il est temps de reprendre la mission qui vous a {mf|amené|amenée} sur ce {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g}. Je vous demande seulement de bien vouloir m'accorder une audience une fois que nous serons de retour à bord du vaisseau. » {n}Heinrix incline la tête pour indiquer que la conversation est terminée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que j'ai terminé ce que j'avais à faire sur Kiava Gamma, il est temps de reprendre la mission qui vous a {mf|amené|amenée} sur ce {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g}. Je vous demande seulement de bien vouloir m'accorder une audience une fois que nous serons de retour à bord du vaisseau. » {n}Heinrix incline la tête pour indiquer que la conversation est terminée.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'daki vazifem sona erdi. Artık seni bu {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünyaya{/g} getiren meseleye dönebiliriz. Tek ricam, gemiye döndüğümüzde seninle konuşmak." {n}Heinrix, başını eğerek sözlerini bitirdiğini ifade ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My business on Kiava Gamma is concluded. It is time to return to the mission that brought you to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g}. The only thing I'll ask of you is an audience when we return to the ship." {n}Heinrix bows his head to signal that the conversation is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'daki vazifem sona erdi. Artık seni bu {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g}ya getiren meseleye dönebiliriz. Tek ricam, gemiye döndüğümüzde seninle konuşmak." {n}Heinrix, başını eğerek sözlerini bitirdiğini ifade ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
